headline.main: A Struggling Theme Park Asks: Do You Still Believe in Santa?
headline.print_headline: A Struggling Theme Park Asks: Do You Still Believe in Santa?

docs.snippet: Attendance is dwindling at Santa’s Workshop in the Adirondacks, bypassed by the Interstate and thrill-ride-inspired attractions. But its biggest hurdle? Santa’s weakening hold on children....
docs.lead_paragraph: Attendance is dwindling at Santa’s Workshop in the Adirondacks, bypassed by the Interstate and thrill-ride-inspired attractions. But its biggest hurdle? Santa’s weakening hold on children.

headline.main: Romania Probes Former Leaders' Roles in 1990 Protest Deaths
headline.print_headline: Romania Probes Former Leaders' Roles in 1990 Protest Deaths

docs.snippet: Romania's military prosecutors have launched a criminal inquiry into former President Ion Iliescu and an ex-prime minister over the deaths of four people when coal miners violently broke up an anti-government protest in 1990....
docs.lead_paragraph: Romania's military prosecutors have launched a criminal inquiry into former President Ion Iliescu and an ex-prime minister over the deaths of four people when coal miners violently broke up an anti-government protest in 1990.

headline.main: Rebuffing Israel, U.S. Allows Censure Over Settlements
headline.print_headline: U.S. Abstains in U.N. Vote Against Israeli Settlements

docs.snippet: The administration’s decision not to veto the United Nations resolution reflected its accumulated frustration over Israeli settlements....

byline.contributor: Peter Baker contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and Mark Landler from Washington.
byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and RICK GLADSTONE

docs.lead_paragraph: The administration’s decision not to veto the United Nations resolution reflected its accumulated frustration over Israeli settlements.

headline.main: Venezuela's Claim of Victim Status in Bribery Case Unlikely to Convince U.S.
headline.print_headline: Venezuela's Claim of Victim Status in Bribery Case Unlikely to Convince U.S.

docs.snippet: A legal strategy switch by Venezuela's state-owned oil giant PDVSA to portray itself as a victim in a massive bribery scheme detected by the U.S. government is unlikely to lead to compensation and may even backfire....
docs.lead_paragraph: A legal strategy switch by Venezuela's state-owned oil giant PDVSA to portray itself as a victim in a massive bribery scheme detected by the U.S. government is unlikely to lead to compensation and may even backfire.

headline.main: Small Luxuries for the New Year’s Eve Plate
headline.print_headline: Champagne Taste on a Beet Budget

docs.snippet: Humble ingredients, like bright golden beets, can be just as celebratory as caviar and truffles....
docs.lead_paragraph: Humble ingredients, like bright golden beets, can be just as celebratory as caviar and truffles.

headline.main: The Story Behind This Week’s Best Sellers

docs.snippet: In response to reader concerns, Janet Evanovich has toned down the swearing in some of her books — but not the Stephanie Plum series. “Turbo Twenty-Three,” the latest, is No. 9 in hardcover fiction....

headline.main: Lockheed CEO Tells Trump She Will Work to Drive Down Cost of F-35
headline.print_headline: Lockheed CEO Tells Trump She Will Work to Drive Down Cost of F-35

docs.snippet: The chief executive of Lockheed Martin Corp told President-elect Donald Trump on Friday that she was committed to driving down the cost of the company's F-35 fighter jet, a day after Trump took aim at the cost of the F-35 in a Twitter post....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Lockheed Martin Corp told President-elect Donald Trump on Friday that she was committed to driving down the cost of the company's F-35 fighter jet, a day after Trump took aim at the cost of the F-35 in a Twitter post.

headline.main: Another Trump Tweet Jab, Again in the Defense Sector
headline.print_headline: Another Trump Tweet Jab, Again in the Defense Sector

docs.snippet: Shares Lockheed Martin slipped while rival Boeing's rose Friday after a tweet from President-elect Donald Trump appeared to pit the two defense industry giants against one another in a bid to lower prices for government contracts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Shares Lockheed Martin slipped while rival Boeing's rose Friday after a tweet from President-elect Donald Trump appeared to pit the two defense industry giants against one another in a bid to lower prices for government contracts.

headline.main: Pochettino Not Worried by Kane Drought Ahead of Saints Trip
headline.print_headline: Pochettino Not Worried by Kane Drought Ahead of Saints Trip

docs.snippet: Tottenham Hotspur striker Harry Kane has been backed to rediscover his scoring touch by manager Mauricio Pochettino ahead of Wednesday's Premier League visit to Southampton....
